channel.title: CVE Feed for convos-chat -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for convos-chat -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-21650|2024-08-03T02:46:39.544Z -- convos-chat -- convos
item.description: Convos is an open source multi-user chat that runs in a web browser. You can't use SVG extension in Convos' chat window, but you can upload a file with an .html extension. By uploading an SVG file with an html extension the upload filter can be bypassed. This causes Stored XSS. Also, after uploading a file the XSS attack is triggered upon a user viewing the file. Through this vulnerability, an attacker is capable to execute malicious scripts. Users are advised to update as soon as possible.

item.title: CVE-2022-21649|2024-08-03T02:46:39.529Z -- convos-chat -- convos
item.description: Convos is an open source multi-user chat that runs in a web browser. Characters starting with "https://" in the chat window create an <a> tag. Stored XSS vulnerability using onfocus and autofocus occurs because escaping exists for "<" or ">" but escaping for double quotes does not exist. Through this vulnerability, an attacker is capable to execute malicious scripts. Users are advised to update as soon as possible.
